About the Game

Before Fate is a survival adventure game with a collection of exploration and a variety of quests to advance the story. Players take on the role of a researcher named Ian, who is supposed to work peacefully when he is unexpectedly confronted by a disaster caused by an alien bug invasion. In a desperate situation, he decides to defeat the insects to gain access to space-time energy and use time travel to stop the disaster before it happens. But it never works out that way.

In this game, players can explore four resource maps with different environments and climates, such as towns, forests, mines and deserts, as well as a number of dungeons with different styles waiting for players to explore the deeper secrets. In addition, after acquiring resources, players can return to the laboratory to synthesize items and experience all kinds of firearms and weapons, as well as crafting a variety of novelty items. Ultimately, guided by the main quest, players will be guided through each chapter of the story to discover the truth about "The Space".
